# Cybernetic Beasts
Cybernetic beasts are a subset of vulpkanin. They have been augmented with a removable visor, or "mantle". This mantle connects to the beast's head with a set of pogo-pins. In practice, this means that beasts can wear each-other's mantles, but a mantle will provide no benefit to somebody who isn't a cybernetic beast.
Cybernetic beasts are naturally short-sighted, but this is corrected by their mantle. In turn, their mantle enhances their vision; it also provides night vision.
Cybernetic mantles are large. They cover the head and face of the wearer. Practically, this means that a beast must remove their mantle in order to use a gas mask, or a set of glasses.
As well, due to the scarce nature of a beast's mantle, a mantle may sometimes become a target for thieves.
## Background
During the early 2400s, Razzi Research and Technology, in their endless pursuit to allow colonists to live on all sorts of worlds, created a set of cybernetic augments are are meant to "grow" with the user. Families that had worked under them for generations were given the chance for their children to be "gifted" these augments for testing.
Due to their simliarty with drawings and photos of old Atlam predators, augmented children would often be labeled as "cybernetic beasts" by the wider population.
